resources.string:
After rolling: 

-> If the sum of two dice is 7 or 11 in the first throw, YOU WIN! 

-> If the sum of two dice is 2 or 3 or 12 in the first throw, YOU LOOSE! 

-> If the sum is 4 or 5 or 6 or 8 or 9 or 10 in the first throw, IT BECOMES YOUR POINTS! 
 To win you must continue rolling the dice until you make your POINTS again. 

-> If the sum of two dice is 7 before making your points, YOU LOOSE!
Press Roll Dice button to start!
